Class JXHyperlink

java.lang.Object

                      org.jdesktop.swingx.JXHyperlink
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class JXHyperlink
extends javax.swing.JButton

A hyperlink component that derives from JButton to provide compatibility mostly for binding actions enabled/disabled behavior accesility i18n etc...

Author:
Richard Bair, Shai Almog, Jeanette Winzenburg
See Also:
Serialized Form
